data.name: The 9th Charnel
data.detailed_description:
The 9th Charnel is a first-person survival horror game. Filled with a rich and frightening atmosphere, this game aims at providing a haunting and desperate action-survival experience. While exploring the many mysteries of this world, you must survive- whether you do it through stealth or by using weapons.
Most of the time, the player has to survive the impossible threats through stealth and clever navigation of the environment. As the player progresses through the game and threats grow significantly more complex, the player uncovers new stories and receives new weapons.


Michael and his colleagues - Sara Whitlock and Daniel J. Hart decide to conduct research at the nearest wildlife sanctuary. On their ill-fated journey, they encounter an inconceivable incident. As a result, their car rolls down the road into a deep valley. Stuck in a valley, alone, Michael must find his friends and survive multiple dangerous life-threatening incidents that lead them to believe that the valley contains cosmic life. To see the fate of the three friends, play to the end.

data.short_description: A first-person survival horror game, The 9th Charnel is filled with a rich and frightening atmosphere. While exploring the many mysteries of this world, you must survive- whether you do it through stealth or by using weapons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050, Radeon RX 560 4GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Performance requirements may change as the game is currently getting optimized.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7th Generation and above or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Storage is recommended

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes that some viewers may find disturbing.
